page.shortlink: form layout custom control properties control items json property
page.description: Defines the the items to add to the FormView layout.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Control items JSON]* property is used to define a JSON object for the Items that should be added to the FormView's layout. The definition can include an array of object where each array is an item definition.
To define the JSON for the control, click the [...] smart field button to open the *[ui:]* builder.

description.p: The *[ui:Reformat JSON]* and *[ui:Validate JSON]* links at the bottom of the dialog can be used to create the JSON definition.
